CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
    treatment_date DATE,
    duration_days INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

);

### STATEMENT

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Appointments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id JOIN Diseases ON Treatments.treatment_id = Diseases.disease_id;

  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),

### STATEMENT

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN (Appointments JOIN (Treatments JOIN Diseases ON Treatments.treatment_id = Diseases.disease_id) ON Appointments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id) ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id;
